dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, welcome back, everyone! Host_B, what's the word on the street, or, uh, you know, in the skies, for the next few days?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, welcome back, everyone! Host B, what's the word on the street, or, uh, you know, in the skies, for the next few days?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Hey Host_A! So, Kazhydromet just dropped their forecast for June 14th, 15th, and 16th. And, uh, it looks like more cyclones are on the way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey Host A! So, Kazhydromet just dropped their forecast for June fourteenth, fifteenth, and sixteenth. And, uh, it looks like more cyclones are on the way.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet forecasters have shared the weather forecast for Kazakhstan on June 14, 15, and 16. Cyclones continue to move across the territory of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, joy. Like, still moving across the country, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, joy. Like, still moving across the country, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Another one's rolling in from the northwest. So, expect some rain and thunderstorms, pretty much.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Another one's rolling in from the northwest. So, expect some rain and thunderstorms, pretty much.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the coming days, another cyclone and its associated atmospheric fronts will begin moving in from the northwest, bringing rain and thunderstorms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, like, general raininess. But are there any specific areas getting hit harder?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, like, general raininess. But are there any specific areas getting hit harder?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, definitely. Especially on the 15th and 16th, they're predicting some pretty heavy rains, um, in West Kazakhstan and the Atyrau regions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, definitely. Especially on the fifteenth and sixteenth, they're predicting some pretty heavy rains, um, in West Kazakhstan and the Atyrau regions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 15â€“16, heavy rains are expected in some areas of the West Kazakhstan and Atyrau regions...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Heavy, like, with hail? I saw something about that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Heavy, like, with hail? I saw something about that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Potentially, yeah! And a noticeable drop in air temperature there too. So, quite a change.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Potentially, yeah! And a noticeable drop in air temperature there too. So, quite a change.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...possibly accompanied by hail and a drop in air temperature.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Huh. So, cooler and wetter in the west. What about the, uh, southern parts of the country?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh. So, cooler and wetter in the west. What about the, uh, southern parts of the country?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ah, the south is a totally different story. They're still under the influence of, like, warm air masses coming up from Iran.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ah, the south is a totally different story. They're still under the influence of, like, warm air masses coming up from Iran.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Meanwhile, the southern half of the country will remain under the influence of warm air masses from the regions of Iran...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, pretty high temperatures down there, then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, pretty high temperatures down there, then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yep, exactly. Forecasters say it's staying quite warm.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, exactly. Forecasters say it's staying quite warm.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...which will keep air temperatures quite high," the forecasters said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, a real mixed bag for Kazakhstan this weekend, then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a real mixed bag for Kazakhstan this weekend, then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. Grab your umbrellas up north, and, uh, maybe your sunglasses down south!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. Grab your umbrellas up north, and, uh, maybe your sunglasses down south!
